TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResXResourceSet extends System.Resources.ResourceSet

summary.span: 表示 XML 資源 (.resx) 檔中的所有資源。

span.span: Represents all resources in an XML resource (.resx) file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別列舉、 載入每個名稱和值，並將它們儲存在雜湊表。The class enumerates over an , loads every name and value, and stores them in a hash table. 然後，您可以列舉中的資源物件，或依名稱擷取個別資源。You can then enumerate the resources in the object or retrieve individual resources by name. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含和適用於所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a and an at the class level that applies to all members. A擲回例外狀況時立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限。A exception is thrown when the immediate caller or a derived class does not have full-trust permission. A物件提供便利的方式來讀取到記憶體中的.resx 檔中的所有資源。A object provides a convenient way to read all the resources in a .resx file into memory. 您可以使用方法來擷取特定的資源，當.resx 檔案讀入執行個體。You can use the method to retrieve a particular resource when the .resx file has been read into a instance. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件，並說明如何列舉其資源，並依名稱擷取個別資源。The following example instantiates a object and illustrates how to enumerate its resources and retrieve individual resources by name. 它會列舉每個資源，此範例會使用屬性在呼叫`GetString`或`GetObject`方法，根據資源的值是字串或物件。For each resource that it enumerates, the example uses the property in a call to the `GetString` or `GetObject` method, depending on whether the value of the resource is a string or an object. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceSet.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourceset.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceSet.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourceset.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] 範例會呼叫`CreateResXFile`方法來建立必要的 XML 資源檔。The example calls a `CreateResXFile` method to create the necessary XML resource file. 需要執行此範例中的目錄中名為 Logo.bmp 點陣圖檔案。It requires a bitmap file named Logo.bmp in the directory in which the example is running.
